scripts.setup:sqlite: npx node-pre-gyp install --directory=node_modules/sqlite3 || echo 'SQLite3 binary installation skipped'
scripts.build:mcp-server: cd packages/architool-mcp-server && pnpm run build && mkdir -p ../../extension/architool/dist/mcp-server && rm -rf ../../extension/architool/dist/mcp-server/* && cp dist/mcp-server.js ../../extension/architool/dist/mcp-server/
scripts.build:webview: cd packages/webview && pnpm run build && mkdir -p ../../extension/architool/dist/webview && rm -rf ../../extension/architool/dist/webview/* && cp -r dist/* ../../extension/architool/dist/webview/
scripts.build: pnpm run build:webview && pnpm run build:mcp-server && pnpm run build:extension && pnpm run copy:vendor
scripts.copy:vendor: mkdir -p extension/architool/dist/vendor/plantuml && cp vendor/plantuml/*.jar extension/architool/dist/vendor/plantuml/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.stash:pop: git stash && git stash pop stash@{1} && git read-tree stash && git stash drop
scripts.package: pnpm run build && cd extension/architool && pnpm run package
